overview: Some say the Los Angeles streets aren't really paved with gold, but these girls would tell you otherwise. You hold in your hand the key that unlocks these four hotel room doors. Spend an evening in the thick of a lovers long weekend, knee deep in sopping wet bath time pleasure, and amidst wild chance encounters that could mean just a little bit more. Experience Los Angeles like never before as you enter the realm of erotic possibility.
title: Four Rooms: Los Angeles
